#summary Install the artifact in local repository.

= Introduction =

To use the archetype you should Download the last stable (right now SNAPSHOT version) from [http://code.google.com/p/vaadin-spring-archetype/downloads/list Download Page].

In future I hope this artifact was deploy on a maven repository and anyone can use it without this step.

= Installation =

After you [http://code.google.com/p/vaadin-spring-archetype/downloads/list download] the file you should open a new Terminal window and type:

{{{
mvn install:install-file                            \
   -Dfile=vaadin-spring-archetype-1.0-SNAPSHOT.jar  \
   -DgroupId=com.vaadin                             \
   -DartifactId=vaadin-spring-archetype             \
   -Dversion=1.0-SNAPSHOT                           \
   -Dpackaging=jar
}}}

This maven command shows the following output:
